document_data.mainbody:
he seal of harmony was a unique enchanted token crafted by Laeral Silverhand for Jarlaxle in the late 15 century DR. It was one of many pieces of so-called "Silverhand gear" crafted for adventurers who helped to protect Waterdeep.
In battle, the seal of harmony served to protect Raika from harm by reflecting incoming attacks back at her foes. Outside of battle, it would pulse steadily to remind Raika to stay on her path and maintain balance in her mission as she transitioned back-and-forth between civilization and the wilderness.
* Raika, a half-orc barbarian for whom Silverhand also crafted the maul of focused destruction, the Great Wolfs Mark, and the Great Wolfs Fury.
